description: Home of the Mayor of London and London Assembly,

events.name: Unescorted Walking Tour
events.notes: Currently in the process of relocating City Hall, so this will be the last opportunity to visit.  Visitors will be able to visit the Chamber and London Living Room, although there will be no access to the spiral ramp.  The ramp can be viewed from the chamber.  The map area will not be open, but can be viewed from the Ground floor ramp.  No catering facilities will be available.Visitors can arrive at any time during the opening hours.There may be queues at busy times.

factsheet.heading: Background
paragraphs: City Hall has been designed as a model of democracy, accessibility and sustainability. It houses the assembly chamber for the 25 elected members of the London Assembly and the offices of the Mayor and staff of the Greater London Authority. It is a highly public building, bringing visitors into close proximity with the workings of the democratic process.

location.address: City Hall, Kamal Chunchie Way, E16 1ZE
travel_info: Nearest tube: Custom House, Canning Town, Royal Victoria

name: City Hall
